we participate in the cultivation of secret wonders.
We aspire to expand the blessings of the fast,
to deliver living beings.

On the [day] of the [month],
for [name], on account of [matter],
we have conducted the Great Fast of the Numinous Treasure for Liberation from Torment,
repenting for the living and the dead,
dissolving grievances and torments.

**Incense Offering and Lamp Lighting**
We kindle incense and light lamps,
illuminating all heavens.
We chant the numinous sounds,
circumambulate in the Dao, and perform rites of repentance.
We liberate the bound spirits of countless generations of ancestors,
the imprisoned and exiled souls of the condemned.
We beseech deliverance from the Ten Sufferings and Eight Adversities,
guiding them to plant the roots of faith.
For so many days, so many nights,
we have circumambulated and recited the scriptures.

Now that the merit is complete and the affairs concluded,
we reverently dismantle the fast’s altar.
We summon the divine hosts—
the cavalry and mounts,
the spirit officials of the Numinous Treasure,
the inspectors and guardians of the fast,
and all those who diligently monitored and protected the rites—
to ascend to the True Palaces,
to be promoted as superior immortals,
and to receive ranks among the celestial hierarchy.

May we, your servants,
having fulfilled our merit and completed our practices,
ascend in radiance to the Nine Heavens.
May the sun and moon shine together,
may the Three Treasures gleam as one.
We humbly implore the Most High Saints
to witness and reflect upon our sincere hearts.

Should we, your servants,
in our movements or pauses,
have transgressed the statutes or failed to conform to the rites,
we beg forgiveness for these unwitting offenses.
May the Fivefold True Officials
be promoted and rewarded according to their merit.
Upon the completion of their duties,
may they ascend together with us.

We reverently submit this petition,
awaiting your august response.
With utmost reverence and awe,
we prostrate again and make this known.

Your humble servants, [names],
of [prefecture], [county], [abbey],
respectfully address
the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao of the Three Heavens of Primordial Beginning,
the Most High Lord Lao,
the Celestial Venerable,
the Heavenly Thearch,
the Nine Elder Immortal Lords of the Grotto-Heavens,
the Ninefold Qi Venerable,
the myriad layers of Dao-qi,
the Twelve Hundred Official Lords,
and the Jade Sovereign of the Great Clarity.

On the [day] of the [month] in the year of [cyclical sign],
at [location],
we humbly submit this petition.

Upon the conclusion of the rites,
we dismiss the Three Masters and others,
in accordance with the Numinous Treasure liturgy.

If the circumambulation spans only a single session,
no prior petition is required.
If it extends for a day and two nights or longer,
then, following the Numinous Treasure statutes,
petition the fast’s officers,
proclaim the prohibitions,
and expound the precepts.
After the merit-recitation,
restore the precepts and resume duties.
All matters must be conducted strictly according to the rites,
without careless deviation.

**End of Scroll Forty of the *Yellow Register Fast Rites***
**Beginning of Scroll Forty-One of the *Yellow Register Fast Rites***

**Collected by Master Du Guangting of the Tang Dynasty**

**On Repentance**

To conduct the Dao and establish the fast, order is fundamental. Even slight disorder disrupts the proper form. When perception falters, ritual deportment and musical offerings falter in their reverence. Not only does this invite censure from the celestial courts, but it also risks ridicule from fellow practitioners.

Should wind and rain approach during rites at the open altar, or in the swelter of summer or the biting cold of winter; if dawn or dusk arrives untimely, or unexpected disturbances arise—halting the proceedings abruptly would cause panic and disorder, while adhering strictly to the statutes would delay and inconvenience. In such cases, the chief cantor may lead the assembly in *stepping the void* before the altar, invoking the divine. If the disturbance is severe, simplify the rites to their essence: the *Three Petitions* and *Great Thanksgiving* will suffice. Adapt to the moment, lest rigidity become one’s undoing.

**Twenty Directions’ General Repentance**

The assembled officers face north as the chief cantor intones:
*"We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Ten Directions’ Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Ten Poles’ Heavenly Lords, the Three Luminaries and Five Peaks, the Three Rivers and Four Seas, the Thirty-Six Divisions of Sacred Scriptures, and all divine immortals and spirit-officials."*

After bowing, each repents with reverence. As the cantor invokes each direction, all bow once:
*"We humbly recall: the Dao acts through non-action, and virtue governs without dominion. It encompasses the myriad dharmas as the greatest within the realm and spans the nine schools to open the gate of all mysteries. The principles of good and evil are distinct, and the statutes of sin and blessing clearly manifest. Thus, the Vermilion Register of the Southern Palace records ascent as the reward for goodness, while the Black Book of the Northern Bureau inscribes death as the reckoning for transgression. These serve to punish and encourage, rescuing the benighted. Only after clarifying the origins of the teaching can one align with the intent of non-action.*

*Now, on behalf of the sponsor of this Great Yellow Register Fast, the official [Name], who cherishes loyalty and filial piety, and whose gratitude to sovereign and kin runs deep, we initiate this rite of incense and devotion to repay the kindness of nurture. With fragrant offerings, ritual gifts, dragon-jade, and patterned silks, we take refuge in the Ten Directions’ Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the perfected deities of the Sun, Moon, and Stars, the True Lords of the Sacred Mountains and Grotto-Heavens, the Five Peaks, the Water Palaces’ revered spirits, the Three Treasures’ officials, the Ten Directions and Three Realms, and all true numina. We beseech the grace of celebration and bestowal, the descent of great compassion’s blessings.*

*May the sponsor’s [Name] household—ancestors of a hundred thousand generations, the wandering souls in the cold courts of eternal night—all be liberated. May the three affinal and five consanguineous kin, all relations and dependents, have their misfortunes erased from the Nine Yin and their blessings born in the Three Luminaries. May calamities cease, and longevity extend. May the Emperor’s sagacity surpass that of Fuxi and Shennong, his years equaling heaven and earth. May the Crown Prince and regional lords long assist in this flourishing era. May the Empress, consorts, and concubines forever uphold the sacred enterprise. May the myriad officials and feudal lords devote themselves to its support. May the four seas and ten thousand lands be transformed by unified culture. May weapons fall silent and wind and rain follow their course. May the sun and moon retain their purity, and the stars their proper motion. May Fengdu’s judgments be stayed, and all creatures dwell in safety. May we all embody the lineage of clarity and stillness, and together realize the Dao of the subtle and formless. After attaining the Dao, may we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true."*

**Twenty Directions’ Sequential Repentance**

The assembled officers move left, stand facing east, and the chief cantor intones:
*"We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Eastern Direction’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit-officials of the Eastern Realm."*

After bowing, each repents with reverence.
*"Eastern Direction..."*

We, your humble servants, have heard that when the Lesser Yang establishes its position, it first opens the Azure Vault’s palace; when the virtue of Wood governs the direction, it unfolds the Blue Origin’s precinct. Issuing the spring mandate, all blossoms receive their beginning; emerging from the domain of Zhen, the imperial enterprise endures in prosperity. We should rely upon the nurturing benevolence of the Dao and exhaust our sincerest devotion in refuge.

Now, with reverence, we present the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, who bears the virtue of life-bestowing grace and feels the profound favor of Heaven and Earth’s shelter. In gratitude for past transgressions and to beseech blessings, he has established this retreat and practiced the Dao. We humbly offer a bolt of blue-green silk and a golden dragon, dedicating them to the Eastern Direction’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit-officials of the Eastern Realm.

We reflect that when the supreme Dao flows forth its compassion, all blossoms find peace; when the warmth of Yang spreads its transformation, all creatures shine in harmony. First, we pray for the extension of the imperial destiny and the well-being of the sagely person. Beyond the Fusang and Penglai Isles, may the world’s chariots share a single track; in the lands of Dongming and Sushen, may auspicious tributes be offered. Next, for the chief patron’s nine generations of lingering attachments, whose transgressions are recorded in the ledgers of Mount Tai, and for his five clans of kin, whose names are inscribed among the immortals of the Eastern Dipper: may misfortunes cease, and the span of fortune and longevity be prolonged. May past faults dissolve of themselves, and blessings of goodness gather abundantly. May all beings, seen and unseen, together bathe in the mysterious grace. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true.

**Southern Direction**

We, your humble servants, have heard that when the Vermilion Heaven first opens, crimson clouds gather in the courtyard of flowing fire; when the Red Emperor establishes his capital, the scarlet qi solemnly adorns the palace of radiant rosy clouds. Spreading the numinous Yang to illumine the nine provinces, proclaiming the virtue of Fire to shine upon the depths of darkness, we rely upon the benevolence of nurturing growth and should offer our most earnest prayers.

Now, with reverence, we present the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, who contemplates the welfare of both family and state, extending to ruler and kin. In gratitude for past transgressions and to beseech blessings, he has established this retreat and practiced the Dao. We humbly offer a bolt of crimson silk and a golden dragon, dedicating them to the Southern Direction’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Three Qi Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit-officials of the Southern Realm.

We reflect that when the virtue of Yang shines its illumination, no darkness remains unlit; when the supreme truth responds to beings, every feeling finds its answer. First, we pray for the sagely person’s supreme fortune and the flourishing of the great enterprise. May the red crow manifest its auspiciousness, and the vermilion phoenix arrive in ceremony. May border cities know no alarms of beacon fires, and distant lands present tribute by land and sea. Next, for the chief patron’s household—his nine generations and seven ancestors refining their essences in the Vermilion Mound, and his five clans and six relations whose names are inscribed on the cinnabar registers—may misfortunes cease, and past faults dissolve of themselves. May the span of fortune and longevity be prolonged, and blessings of goodness gather abundantly. May all creatures, sentient and insentient, together bathe in the mysterious grace. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true.

**Western Direction**

We, your humble servants, have heard that the Great Emperor of the Golden Direction governs the jade towers to unfold the celestial plan, and the Heavenly Lord of Pristine Virtue resides in the gem-studded palace to expound the teachings. The rightmost reaches command the floating peaks of Mount Fu Luo, while the Western March divides the Supreme Wondrous Capital. We revere the majesty of autumn’s stern power, the hope of all creation.

Now, with utmost reverence, the chief patron of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, so-and-so, holds profound devotion to family and state, and weighty duty to sovereign and kin. To atone for transgressions and pray for blessings, he has established this retreat and practiced the Dao. We humbly present a bolt of plain-woven silk and a golden dragon, dedicating them to the Limitless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Western Direction, the Heavenly Lords of the Seven Qi, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Western Quarter.

We note that the jade tablets have set forth the law, with deliverance as their foremost principle, and the golden perfection flows forth in grace, with nurturing compassion as its essence. First, we pray for blessings upon the sagely court, preserving the peace of the imperial throne. May the jade-sealed celestial records extend the imperial enterprise without end, and the white phoenix and pale unicorn manifest auspicious omens for eternity. Next, for the chief patron’s household—his nine generations of departed souls ascending to the hidden palaces of mystery, and his living kin whose names are inscribed in the Western Na’s realm—may disasters vanish before they arise, and new blessings descend. May all beings, moving and still, receive grace, and both the living and the dead know peace. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true.

**Northern Direction**

We, your humble servants, have heard that the fivefold qi, swirling and coalescing, congeals into the vastness of the Guanghan Palace, and the boundless yin, vast and distant, shapes the silent realm. Manifesting singular virtue to succor the ten thousand regions, and spreading supreme goodness to unfold the myriad wonders, we rely upon the mysterious transformation and present the sincerity of this retreat.

Now, with utmost reverence, the chief patron of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, so-and-so, holds weighty duty to sovereign and kin, and profound devotion to family and state. To establish this retreat, practice the Dao, atone for transgressions, and pray for blessings, we humbly present a bolt of dark-woven silk and a golden dragon, dedicating them to the Limitless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Northern Direction, the Heavenly Lords of the Five Qi, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northern Quarter.

We note that the mysterious virtue is impartial, circulating through the myriad lands, and its supreme merit extends afar, nurturing the six voids. We pray first that the sagely plan be upheld and the celestial longevity prolonged, as boundless as the deep sea and as enduring as the Northern Culmen. Next, for the chief patron’s household—his nine ancestors and seven departed kin—may they forever depart the dark prisons, leave the borders of Feng Du, and ascend to the vast palaces of the boundless. May his living kin be recorded in the mysterious registers. May calamities be eradicated and past faults silently dissolve. May fortune and longevity be renewed, and blessings and good fortune gather abundantly. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true.

**Northeastern Direction**

**Northeastern Direction**

We prostrate ourselves and hear: the verdant peaks of Mount Gen rise in emerald splendor, its flowing waters carrying the lingering ripples of Kan; the celestial vault floats in azure clarity, where the auspicious qi of Zhen Wood first stirs. Here, the supreme transformation is exalted in the realm of primordial vastness, and the divine breeze is fanned within the Purple Ultimate’s court. We gaze upward to the sagely virtue that brings forth life, awaiting the divine work that opens deliverance.

Now, the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, holds foremost the state and family, extending to lord and kin. In repentance of transgressions and prayer for blessings, he establishes this retreat and practices the Dao. With reverence, he presents one bolt of yellow-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Qi of Brahma Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northeastern Quarter.

We humbly observe: as harmonious warmth spreads, all beings—whether soaring or sinking—attain peace. The true essence moves alone, and numinous transformation knows no bounds. First, we pray that blessings extend to the ancestral line, aligning with the Two Modes to secure the altars of state; that the sagely sovereign’s glory be transmitted, equaling the Two Luminaries to illumine the ten thousand regions. Next, for the chief patron’s household—his nine generations and seven departed kin—may they shed their forms in the realm of empty song; may his six relations and five clans inscribe their names in the Palace of Bright Valley. May his lifespan be prolonged within, and calamities cease without. May the hidden and manifest rejoice together, and all creatures partake in glory. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to become true.

**Southeastern Direction**

We prostrate ourselves and hear: beneath the cinnabar towers, the qi of Brahma coalesces to form palaces; within the crimson courtyards, the winds of Xun stir to nurture all things. Here, the hundred valleys pay homage as to their source, and the three mountains display wondrous transformations. The permeating virtue knows no bounds, matching the mysterious work that does not act.

Now, the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, holds deep loyalty to state and family, and profound duty to lord and kin. In repentance of transgressions and prayer for blessings, he establishes this retreat and practices the Dao. With reverence, he presents one bolt of yellow-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Qi of Brahma Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Southeastern Quarter.

We humbly observe: the great Dao’s vast compassion spreads its grace universally. It condenses the utmost truth to descend and aid, bestowing numinous blessings without omission.

We now humbly pray that the patron’s grand destiny of supreme fortune may rival the boundless vastness of the ocean’s depths, and that his sacred longevity may equal the towering heights of Penglai’s immortal peaks. May his nine generations of ancestors, their divine forms released, be freed from the dark gates of the earthly realm; and may his living kin, their names inscribed in the celestial registers, stand among the ranks of immortals. May past transgressions dissolve of themselves, and misfortunes forever cease. Before calamity even stirs, let blessings descend anew. May all living beings, both moving and still, universally receive the shelter of the Dao’s shade. After attaining the Way, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with true reality.

To the Southwest, we, your servants, humbly observe: the two symbols divide their numinous power, weaving the hidden mechanisms of the Kun wilds; the doubled yin settles into its place, condensing utmost stillness at the earth’s axis. Facing the sun’s domain, it asserts its might; controlling the moon’s gate, it establishes its pole. All creatures draw sustenance from it to grow and flourish, while the myriad dharmas embody it to attain stillness and peace.

Now, the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, for state and family, establishes this retreat and practices the Dao. With reverence, he presents one bolt of yellow-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Southwest, the Qi of Brahma Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Southwestern Quarter.

We humbly observe: though the most sagely and exalted perfected ones elude pursuit, the treasury of blessings they bestow responds unfailingly to sincere prayer and devotion.

We humbly beseech the sacred chart of blessings to safeguard the great enterprise, that the Nine Enclosures be serene and still, the Six Harmonies flourish in peace.

Next, we pray for the retreat’s patron, so-and-so’s household: may the nine generations and seven lineages be freed from the earthly bureau’s ledgers of judgment; may the bound spirits and stagnant consciousnesses wander freely upon the cloud-sands’ path. May the living kin be inscribed in the immortal registry; may calamities and declines cease, and official emoluments and lifespan be prolonged. May all living beings share equally in blessings and protection. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the true.

In the Northwestern Quarter:
We humbly observe: the Jade Emperor, his crown pendants congealed in stillness, governs from the Heavenly Gate to spread transformation; the Golden Numinous One, dwelling in his celestial seat, encompasses the Qian and Lu hexagrams to lay the foundation. The host of stars hangs the pattern of the Pole Star’s reverence, while the myriad phenomena embody the movement of primal flourishing. Truly, they oversee transgressions and blessings, governing all living beings.

Now, the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, burdened with profound gratitude for sovereign and kin, and deep sincerity for family and state, establishes this retreat to practice the Dao, repenting transgressions and praying for blessings. With reverence, he presents one bolt of yellow-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Northwest, the Qi of Brahma Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northwestern Quarter.

We humbly note: the Dao of Heaven shines brightly, circulating without cease. The numinous immortals, in hidden assistance, bestow their protection without omission.

May it specially beseech the sagely court above to consolidate the myriad achievements, perpetuate the imperial enterprise, and eternally bring about harmonious prosperity. May it further beseech that the household of Retreat Patron so-and-so—across nine generations and seven mysteries, with the six relations’ lingering attachments—find their spirits dwelling in Kunlun and Penglai, their steps soaring through mist and clouds. May their present clan and kin know no calamity or decline, their emoluments endure and lives lengthen, misfortune vanish and blessings arise. May all creatures possessing consciousness be preserved in primordial auspiciousness. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the true.

Above, we humbly note: the singular qi surges and merges, circulating through the Great Void to form images; the Two Modes shine resplendently, opening the vast expanse without bound. The five hundred million heavens are divided, the three thousand realms arrayed. Wind and thunder, cold and heat—how can one speak of their equal distribution across the four seasons? Solemnity and growth, killing and creation—all follow the Six Voids yet remain ungoverned. Now, the chief patron of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, so-and-so, bearing the vast encompassing compassion and moved by the virtue of nurturing completion, establishes this retreat to practice the Dao, repenting transgressions and praying for blessings. With reverence, he presents one bolt of azure-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Upper Realm, the Thirty-Six Heavenly Lords, the Perfected of Jade Capital and Mystic Capital’s Purple Tenuity Upper Palace, the divine immortals and jade maidens, and the spirit officials of the Upper Realm’s boundless worlds. We humbly observe: the mysterious transformation pervades all, illuminating even the unseen; the celestial perfected broadly succor, responding unfailingly to all who are moved.

May this specially beseech the augmentation of blessings for the imperial court, that the celestial mandate flourish abundantly. May the imperial Dao be proclaimed and disseminated, bringing peace and tranquility to all regions. Next, may the retreat’s sponsor, so-and-so, and his family—his nine generations of ancestors and seven lineages of kin—have their souls elevated to the celestial palaces. May his living relatives ascend the ranks of the immortals. May their longevity and prosperity increase and flourish, while misfortunes and calamities cease and vanish. May those in the three paths and nine nights alike bathe in the mysterious perfection.

We, the humble servants below, have heard: the numinous spirits established their positions, and the vast earth shaped its forms. It spans the eight directions without bound, dividing the nine domains without limit. All regions rely upon it for sustenance, and the myriad beings depend on it for birth and transformation.

Now, the sponsor of this Grand Retreat of the Yellow Register, so-and-so, deeply devoted to sovereign and kin, and profoundly bound by duty to family and state, establishes this retreat to practice the Dao, repenting transgressions and praying for blessings. With reverence, he presents one bolt of yellow-patterned silk and one golden dragon, dedicating them to the Boundless Supreme Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Lower Realm, the August Sovereign of the Nine Lands, the Four Directors and Five Emperors, the Twelve Immortal Lords, the Perfected of the Nine Palaces, the divine immortals and jade maidens, and the spirit officials of the Lower Realm’s boundless worlds. We humbly observe: the supreme sages bestow their scriptures, universally bestowing fortune upon both the seen and unseen; the perfected expound their teachings, extending their grace to all under heaven.

May the Auspicious Emperor’s Palace descend with blessings, and the Heavenly Gates of Fortune extend their grace. May it align with the earth’s expanse to endure forever, and harmonize with the profound depths without depletion.

Next, we pray for the ancestral spirits of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], that they transcend the nether realms and depart the shades of the underworld. May the living kin dwell securely in the land of blessings, their emoluments and longevity prolonged, calamities and misfortunes extinguished. May all sentient beings, even the lowliest creatures, bathe in the mysterious power. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Palace of the Sun**
We, your humble servants, have heard: the radiant sun unfurls its splendor, and the yang brilliance surges forth. At dawn, it ascends from the wastes of Yang Valley; at dusk, it withdraws to the shores of Yu Springs. Its nine rays scatter low, casting light along the Yellow Path; its five hues subtly divide, ascending the azure void to present auspicious omens. Having received the virtue of its oversight, we earnestly contemplate the rites of reverent repayment.

Now, the sponsor of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, [Name], acting for state and family, presents ritual offerings with devotion. Establishing the retreat to practice the Dao, he repents transgressions and prays for blessings. With utmost sincerity, we turn toward and revere the August Perfected and Great Sage of the Sun Palace, the August Sovereign of the Solar Orb, the Illuminated August Perfected, the Cinnabar Cloud Jade Maidens, the Vermilion Radiance Cavern’s Luminous Child of Great Light, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Sun Palace.

We especially pray for the sovereign’s sacred person to receive illumination, that the precious mandate may shine forth. Above, may it equal the dual luminaries; below, may it illuminate the ten thousand directions. Next, we pray for the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], that the living and deceased alike receive grace, and disasters and misfortunes be stilled. May they forever revere the impartial radiance and eternally follow the winds of the Dao-endowed. May their bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same brilliance as the Great Sun. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Palace of the Moon**
We, your humble servants, have heard: the supreme yin suspends its image, and the Jade Hare congeals its splendor. Following the nine paths, its radiance flows; waxing and waning adhere to measure. Dividing into ten branches, its light scatters impartially. Having received the grace of its oversight, we earnestly contemplate the rites of reverent repayment.

Now, the sponsor of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, [Name], acting for state and family, presents ritual offerings with devotion. Establishing the retreat to practice the Dao, he repents transgressions and prays for blessings. With utmost sincerity, we turn toward and revere the August Perfected and Great Sage of the Moon Palace, the August Sovereign of the Lunar Orb, the Unadorned August Perfected, the Scattered Radiance Jade Maidens, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Moon Palace.

We especially pray for the ancestral line to receive fortune, that the blessings of the mandate may endure. May heaven and earth stand equally firm, and sun and moon shine with equal brightness. For the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may emoluments and longevity be renewed, and the living and deceased alike know peace. May disasters and declines not arise, and transgressions and faults dissolve of themselves. May their bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same brilliance as the Great Yin. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Palace of the Stars**

We, your humble servants, have heard that the Two Radiant Ones divide their brilliance, while the host of stars array their luminosity. The Three Terraces and Five Wefts trail their light across the azure vault; the Seven Regulators and Three Palaces spread their forms through the Great Purity. They govern the seas and mountains, command all living beings, and by their gracious illumination, we are moved to offer rites of bright requital.

Now we reverently present the sponsor of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, [Name], who bears the ritual offerings for state and family, seeking to atone for transgressions and pray for blessings. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the starry deities of the heavens: the Jade Celestial Pivot and the Northern Apex, the Five Planets and the Northern Dipper, the Nine Stars and Three Terraces, the Twenty-Eight Lunar Lodges, and all the great spirits, perfected ones, and divine immortals residing within the three hundred and sixty-five degrees of the celestial sphere. We especially beseech their hidden support for the great enterprise and their subtle aid to the sagely court. May the Pole Star stand in equal majesty, and auspicious stars manifest their portents. For the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the Nine Ancestral Generations be delivered, and the entire clan know peace. May emoluments and longevity be prolonged, and misfortunes and calamities cease. May they enjoy propitious blessings and know no ill omens under heaven’s gaze. May their bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same brilliance as the Star Palace. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Eastern Marchmount**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the Five Peaks hold their fixed positions, with Mount Tai foremost in honor. Its verdant hues congeal into mist, its cloud pavilions soar beyond the heavens; its layered peaks rise in succession, its Sun-Contemplating Terrace overlooks the sea’s edge. Below, it governs the yin spirits and secretly administers rewards and punishments.

Now we reverently present the sponsor of this Yellow Register Grand Retreat, [Name], who offers prayers for state and family, seeking to atone for transgressions and entreat blessings. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Azure Thearch Perfected Sovereign of the Eastern Marchmount, the Flying Immortals, the Perfected Ones of the renowned grotto-heavens, and all the divine immortals and spirit officials of the sacred peaks. We humbly pray for their aid in protecting the sagely person and upholding the imperial enterprise. May heaven and earth share in peace, and the seas and mountains stand in tranquility. For the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the living and deceased alike receive grace, and their emoluments and lifespan be everlasting. May a thousand disasters not arise, and a hundred blessings be renewed. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Southern Marchmount**

We, your humble servants, have heard that the Fire Phase establishes the supreme pole, and the Crimson Thearch divides his capital. The Vermilion Mound opens its depths, concealing mist and rosy clouds beyond the seas; the Purple Canopy Peak towers aloft, cradling sun and moon amid the clouds. As it governs the realm of perfected sages, it also oversees the registers of life and death. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Crimson Thearch Perfected Sovereign of the Southern Marchmount Hengshan, the Flying Immortals, the Perfected Ones of the renowned grotto-heavens, and all the divine immortals and spirit officials of the sacred peaks. We humbly pray for blessings to descend upon the southern heavens and felicity to extend to the northern palace. May the jade chart grow ever more secure, and the sagely sun shine with increasing brilliance. For the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the nine generations of ancestral spirits ascend to the Crimson Mound and shed their earthly forms; may the living kin be inscribed in the Purple Palace. May their emoluments and lifespan be exalted, and all calamities and misfortunes forever cease. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Western Marchmount**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the Lotus Peak rises in emerald splendor, and Mount Huashan reigns supreme. It stands solitary above the eight rivers, flanking the imperial palace; it towers above the nine streams, firmly anchoring the divine continent. It secretly governs the perfected spirits and clearly oversees the registers of sin and [blessing]. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the White Thearch Perfected Sovereign of the Western Marchmount Huashan, the Flying Immortals, the Perfected Ones of the renowned grotto-heavens, and all the divine immortals and spirit officials of the sacred peaks. We especially beseech your aid in protecting the grand enterprise and upholding the sagely sun. May the imperial destiny extend across ten thousand generations, and longevity equal the Three Peaks. For the household of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the living and deceased alike dwell in peace, and their emoluments and lifespan be everlasting. May disasters vanish before they arise, and blessings descend without limit. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Northern Marchmount**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the august marchmount spans the sky, blocking the northern wilds to eclipse the sun; the clustered peaks accumulate their beauty, supporting heaven from the northern continent. It devours the lands of the northern deserts and towers over the plains of You and Yan. It contains thunder and rain, and governs the registers of life and death.

Here is the translation:

---

Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], acting for state and family, establishes the retreat and practices the Dao. With utmost sincerity, they take refuge in the Black Emperor True Lord of Northern Marchmount Hengshan, the Flying Immortals, the True Persons of the renowned mountains and grotto-heavens, and all the divine officials who have attained the Dao. We humbly pray that blessings extend to the imperial palace, preserving peace and prosperity. May the dragon’s chart and marchmount’s stability endure, and the phoenix’s records align with heaven’s order. For the sponsor’s family, may their nine generations of ancestors ascend beyond the dark realms of Youdu; may their six relations enjoy radiant peace, basking in the sacred sun’s brilliance. May sins be extinguished and disasters dispelled, with longevity and emoluments everlasting. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Central Marchmount**
We, your humble servants, have heard that as the revered of the four wilds and the chief of all mountains, the lofty Songshan stands supreme among the marchmounts, its towering heights reaching heaven. With thirty-six peaks rising and falling, its verdant hues span Gong and Luo; stretching for myriad miles, its azure expanse upholds the vault of heaven. It governs the lives of beings and oversees the judgment of sins and blessings.

Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], acting for state and family, seeks grace and repents transgressions. With utmost sincerity, they take refuge in the Yellow Emperor True Lord of Central Marchmount Songshan, the Flying Immortals, the True Persons of the renowned mountains and grotto-heavens, and all the divine officials who have attained the Dao. We humbly pray that ancestral blessings flourish, bringing peace to the realm. May the grand chart and marchmount’s stability endure, and the sacred lifespan align with heaven’s order. For the sponsor’s family, may their seven generations of ancestral spirits dwell in the jade grotto; may their six relations and kin be inscribed in the resplendent registers. May disasters be eradicated and longevity with emoluments ever increase. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Water Palace**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the highest virtue lies in merit, governing the Kan Palace to accumulate power; the most yielding nature flows through the Xun Sea to still its waves. It draws its numen from the primordial chaos and extends its sageliness beyond heaven and earth. Floating the sky and bathing the sun, its boundless source defies measure; spanning the earth and steaming clouds, its vast expanse eludes comprehension. Below, it opens the dragon gods’ palace and divides the bureaus of sin and blessing. Its governance is impartial, sustaining both the hidden and the manifest.

Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], acting for family and state, repents transgressions and seeks grace. With utmost sincerity, they take refuge in the Great Emperor of Fusang, the Divine King of Yang Valley, the Water Emperors of the Three Rivers, Four Seas, and Nine Jiang, the divine officials of the twelve river sources and water palaces. We humbly pray that blessings from the nine heavens flow to all nations. May turtle-script and dragon-seals herald auspicious omens in the age of Yao; may seas be calm and rivers clear, matching the sacred era’s longevity. For the sponsor’s family, may the nine generations of ancestral spirits erase their names from the water palace’s ledgers of sin; may their five relations and six kin be recorded in the immortal registers of Peng Palace. May disasters naturally cease and emoluments ever grow. May all creatures, winged and swimming, together receive the mysterious grace. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**Sacred Scriptures**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the Great Dao divides its light, first expounding the wordless teaching; the Heavenly Worthy spreads transformation, gradually bestowing the written works. Thus, qi coalesces into chapters, and clouds congeal into seals. Each character spans a zhang, radiating eight-cornered numinous rays; their traces scatter across the heavens, harmonizing with the five assemblies’ tones. The twelve hundred precepts, twelve thousand rules of deportment, thirty-six divisions of sacred scriptures, and three thousand six hundred canons and statutes—cultivating them leads to immortality and transcendence as a divine immortal; upholding them aids the state, guides the sovereign, pacifies the people, and benefits all beings. They encompass all methods and universally deliver sentient beings.

Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], acting for family and state, repents transgressions and seeks grace. With utmost sincerity, they take refuge in the Most True and Supreme Thirty-Six Divisions of Sacred Scriptures, the natural scriptural precepts, the orthodox Dharma of the ten directions, the secret treasuries of all heavens, the true writs and precious talismans, the scripture-attending divine lords, ministers, and officials, and all the divine bureaus of ritual and dharma protection. We humbly pray that blessings descend from the nine heavens, bestowing prosperity upon all nations. May the sacred body be harmonious and flourishing, and the precious mandate enduring. For the sponsor’s family, may the nine generations of ancestral spirits be inscribed on the cinnabar tablets; may their six relations and kin be ranked in the purple registers. May disasters be eradicated and blessings with longevity ever expand. May the three paths and nine nights together bathe in the divine merit. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

*Concluding the Forty-First Scroll of the* **Ritual of the Yellow Register Retreat of the Most High**
*Beginning the Forty-Second Scroll*
*Compiled by Master Guangcheng of the Tang, Du Guangting*

**The Twenty Directions Litany for Disaster Dispelling and Repentance by the Gentry and Common Folk**

First, the Salutation to the Directions.
Next, the Repentance.

**East**
We, your servants, have heard that the mysterious transformation divides the regions, transcending the domain of *Zhen*. It crowns the head of the Five Phases and initiates the Four Seasons. It establishes the imperial Dao so that all things may arise, and spreads benevolent virtue so that all quarters may flourish. Now, with reverence, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], seeks to requite the workings of creation and repent of transgressions. With earnest sincerity, we follow the prescribed rites. We humbly present a bolt of azure silk and a golden dragon, bowing in homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the East, the Nine *Qi* Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Eastern Quarter.

We reflect that the teachings of the indistinct and subtle are of wondrous efficacy, beyond measure; the realm of the silent and vast is of unfathomable transformation. Radiant with the first yang, it overlooks the Eight Extremities; its flowing *hao* qi blankets the Nine Regions. Below, it perceives the sincerity of devout hearts; above, it bestows the blessings of nurturing care. We pray that the sponsor’s family, spanning nine generations and seven lineages, may have their names inscribed in the Purple Registers. May their living kin and relations have their merits recorded in the Azure Records. May they ever encounter sagely rule and forever rejoice in the era of Yao. May all sentient beings receive the mysterious protection. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**South**
We, your servants, have heard that the virtue of *Li* is doubly luminous, its true essence resplendent. It assists the Two Modes in their transformations and elevates the Three *Qi* to bring forth creation. It dispels the miasmic obscurity of the high heavens and scatters the gloom of distant realms. The sponsor, [Name], seeks to requite the mysterious workings of creation and offers up sincere devotion. We arrange the altar and follow the prescribed rites. We humbly present a bolt of crimson silk and a golden dragon, bowing in homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the South, the Three *Qi* Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Southern Quarter.

We reflect that the great transformation is impartial, its mysterious grace universally bestowed. It condenses the utmost truth beyond form and flows with essential subtlety within the world. It looks down upon our prayers and, in its boundless compassion, grants our pleas. We pray that the sponsor’s family, spanning nine generations, may have their lingering delusions inscribed in the Cinnabar Records. May their living kin and relations have their names recorded in the Purple Registers. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**West**

We humbly acknowledge that the marshlands of the West conceal flowing waters, as the Metal Heavens ride their destined course. Rejoicing in the myriad beings, they fulfill the heart of nurturing and sustaining; responding to the four seasons, they guide the transformations of birth and completion. All talents receive their duties through resolute judgment, while all creatures take their models from the principles of righteousness.

The sponsor, bearing the grace of Heaven and Earth, wishes to offer reverent repayment; reflecting on the accumulation of past transgressions, they are resolved to repent and remove them. Having arranged the altar and followed the prescribed rites, we respectfully present a bolt of plain-patterned silk and a golden dragon, and pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the West, the Seven *Qi* Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Western Quarter.

We reflect that the mysterious transformation operates in myriad ways, responding unfailingly to all entreaties. Its perfect impartiality is singular, and no sincere plea goes unanswered. In all that we devoutly pray for, we truly seek manifest protection. We pray that the sponsor’s family, spanning nine generations, may have their spiritual consciousnesses elevated to the Vermilion Mound. May their living kin and relations have their names inscribed in the Dark Garden. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to unite with the True.

**North**

We humbly acknowledge that the utmost yin initiates the turning of destiny, and the power of supreme virtue is cultivated in the Palace of the Abysmal. All things find their rest therein, and all regions draw upon it for tranquil repose.

The sponsor, reflecting on the mysterious transformation, exhausts their sincerity in devotion. Having arranged the altar and followed the prescribed rites, we respectfully present a bolt of dark-patterned silk and a golden dragon, and pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the North, the Five *Qi* Heavenly Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northern Quarter.

Their grace suffuses all beings, governing the numinous and the bright alike. Their virtue extends to all life, universally bestowing blessings upon both the hidden and the manifest.

For all petitions offered, may communion be attained. We humbly pray that the sponsor’s ancestral spirits of past lives may roam freely in the Dao-realm, that their present kin may enjoy felicity and prosperity as is fitting, and that all sentient beings may universally receive true protection. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with reality.

**Northeast Quarter**
We your servants have heard that the workings of creation follow cycles, beginning and ending in the *Gen* domain. All species take form therein, blending with the numinous. Movement and stillness follow the seasons; transformation responds to resonance. The sponsor, reflecting on the illumination and nurturance of the Dao, seeks to atone for transgressions. Having arranged the altar and followed the prescribed rites, we respectfully present a bolt of yellow-patterned silk and a golden dragon, and pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Northeast, the Celestial Lords of *Fan-qi*, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northeast Quarter.

We humbly consider that the utmost essence stands alone as the progenitor of all transformation, while the True Unity circulates universally, unfolding the Dharma for the deliverance of humanity. All who turn toward them shall surely receive their illumination. We humbly pray that the sponsor’s ancestral spirits of past generations may ascend to the Pure Realms, that their living kin may forever dwell in the courts of blessing, and that all moving and breathing beings may attain peace and security. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with reality.

**Southeast Quarter**
We your servants have heard that the great transformation is impartial, circulating through the eight domains. It issues the decrees of *Xun*, facing the steadfast direction of *Qian*. Thus institutions extend to humanity, and moral teachings spread to all things. The sponsor, reflecting on the mysterious transformation, exhausts their sincerity in devotion. Having arranged the altar and followed the prescribed rites, we respectfully present a bolt of yellow-patterned silk and a golden dragon, and pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Southeast, the Celestial Lords of *Fan-qi*, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Southeast Quarter.

We humbly consider that the essence of the Valley Spirit responds to echoes without end, and the heart of the bellows moves ceaselessly with all activity. We humbly pray that the sponsor’s seven generations of lingering spirits may ascend to the Vermilion Palace, that their nine clans may forever partake of great fortune, and that after attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with reality.

**Southwest Quarter**
We your servants have heard that the Yellow Center initiates destiny, and its vast profundity divides into forms...

All living things, both moving and still, draw sustenance for their existence, and thus the myriad kinds are distinguished. The long rivers stretch boundlessly, their distant shores beyond the reach of the four extremities; the vast wilds stretch endlessly, their farthest bounds beyond the eight wastes. Now the great *Huanglu* precept-holder, so-and-so, desiring to repay the grace of nurturance and to atone for transgressions, has prepared offerings for the perfumed rites, following the prescribed forms. Humbly presenting a bolt of yellow-patterned silk and a golden dragon, we pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Southwest, the Celestial Lords of *Fan-qi*, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Southwest Quarter.

We humbly consider that the lofty perfected and exalted sages employ wondrous efficacy without limit. Their feathered chariots ride the clouds, emerging from nonbeing into being. Their kindness extends to all that moves and rests, their grace pervades the hidden and submerged. We pray that the ancestral spirit-forms of the sponsor may transcend and ascend to the pure realms, that their living kin and relations may be secretly nourished by blessings, and that the hundreds of living beings may all receive mysterious protection. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with reality.

**Northwest Quarter**
We your servants have heard that the august symbol of *Qian* is exalted, giving rise to the transformations of all things. It preserves the essence of firm strength and accords with the square of Great Harmony. Its four virtues circulate universally, rectifying the nature and destiny of humans and spirits; its six dragons soar and rest, enabling the transformations of yin and yang. Now the great *Huanglu* precept-holder, so-and-so, bearing the grace of nurturance and moved by the gift of shaping and molding, reflects upon past lives and the present existence, where transgressions have accumulated in cycles. Resolving to undertake the burning of incense and the cultivation of rites, he hopes to receive purification. Humbly presenting a bolt of yellow-patterned silk and a golden dragon, we pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Northwest, the Celestial Lords of *Fan-qi*, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Northwest Quarter.

We humbly consider that the utmost perfected abide in stillness, yet nothing escapes their illumination. The mysterious Dao is profoundly obscure, yet all receive its scrutiny and protection.

We humbly pray that the *Huanglu* precept-holder, so-and-so, and his household may purify their ancestral rites and refine their essences in the Upper Palace. May his kin and relations all receive purity and auspiciousness. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Upper Realm**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the Great Void is boundless and vast, the celestial patterns lofty and sublime. Below lie the Twenty-Eight Heavens, above encompass the Thirty-Five Divisions. The stars revolve in illumination, the sun and moon stream forth their radiance. They are stirred by thunder and nourished by clouds and rain. Crowned by the Great Veil, they broadly overspread, reaching the empty vastness in their high oversight.

Now the great *Huanglu* precept-holder, so-and-so, bearing the grace of nurturance, reflects upon the rites of profound repayment. Humbly presenting a bolt of azure-patterned silk and a golden dragon, we pay homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Upper Realm, the Thirty-Six Celestial Lords, the Divine Lords of the Mystic Capital Jade Metropolis Purple Tenuity Golden Gate, the Three Clarities, the Three Realms, the *Fan-qi* Celestial Lords, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Upper Quarter.

We humbly consider that the jade palaces and gem towers hold mysteries beyond fathoming. The exalted sages and perfected transcendents transform without trace. With a single stirring of sincere devotion, profound blessings are widely bestowed. We pray that the nine generations of the precept-holder’s household may ascend from the dark realms, that his six relations and kin may dwell in the land of blessings, and that all living beings may universally receive hidden protection. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Lower Realm**
We, your humble servants, have heard that the depths congeal into form, descending into the utmost yin. The Four Seas cannot compare to their depth, nor can the Nine Marshes rival their profundity.

Now the great *Huanglu* precept-holder, so-and-so, reflecting upon the grace of nurturance, prepares offerings for the rites of incense and cultivation. Arranging the yellow altar and adhering to the mysterious pattern, we humbly present a bolt of yellow-patterned silk and a golden dragon, paying homage to the Vast Boundless Supreme Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Lower Realm, the Ninefold Earthly Sovereigns, the Four Directors and Five Emperors, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Lower Quarter.

We humbly consider that the qi ascends and descends, fixing the positions of high and low. The Two Modes divide, and the divine transformations unfold. The work of shaping and molding follows a pattern, while the intimacy of resonance and response leaves no trace. We pray that the ninefold spirits of the precept-holder’s household may ascend to the Vermilion Palace, that his worldly kin may have their names inscribed in the Crimson Register. After attaining the Dao, may they ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Palace of the Sun**

We humbly recall that the Great Sun repays virtue, shining with impartial radiance. It enters Yu Valley to conceal its brilliance and emerges from Xian Pool to cast forth its splendor. Soaring beyond the Eight Voids, it blazes resplendent within the Six Directions. Now veiled in the somber hues of autumn, now lingering in the tender shades of spring. The precept-holder, bearing the Sun’s impartial illumination, seeks to honor its grace with utmost sincerity.

With wholehearted devotion, we reverently invoke the August Sovereign of the Sun Palace, the Illustrious Perfected of Radiance, the Cinnabar Cloud Jade Maidens, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Sun Palace. We reflect that the true numina are lofty and pure, while the human path is humble and lowly. Though we have received the grace of its illuminating gaze, how could we be free from the dust of transgression? We beseech your pardon and forgiveness, that we may renew ourselves from this day forth. May our bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same radiance as the Great Sun. After attaining the Dao, may we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Palace of the Moon**
We humbly recall that the Great Yin manifests its image, waxing and waning in constancy. Revolving through the Great Void, it illumines the cosmos. Its encircling glow now divides on the nights of the sixteenth and seventeenth, its jade-like radiance nearing fullness at the fifteenth hour. By this alternation of darkness and light, the rhythms of the seasons are fixed.

Now the precept-holder of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, bearing the Moon’s impartial gaze, seeks to honor its grace with utmost sincerity. With wholehearted devotion, we reverently invoke the August Sovereign of the Moon Palace, the Luminous Perfected of Purity, the Scattered Radiance Jade Maidens, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Moon Palace. We reflect that the true numina are lofty and pure, while the human path is humble and lowly. Though we have received the grace of its illuminating gaze, how could we be free from the dust of transgression? We beseech your pardon and forgiveness, that we may renew ourselves from this day forth. May our bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same radiance as the Great Yin. After attaining the Dao, may we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Palace of the Stars**

We humbly acknowledge that yin and yang divide their illumination, and the stellar paths follow in sequence. The twelve celestial palaces take their measure from the Central Dipper; the twenty-eight lunar lodges fix their pivot upon the Northern Axiom. Thus the Jade Hare ascends in radiance, the Golden Steed withdraws its brilliance. Together they blaze beneath the vaulted canopy, each shimmering within the celestial net. Through them, the animate and inanimate are distinguished, and all living beings receive their allotment.

With reverence, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, having received the grace of their illumination, now offer our utmost sincerity in repayment. In all our movements and dwellings, how could we be free from the dust of transgression? With wholehearted devotion, we invoke the starry hosts of the heavens, the Jade Armillary of the Northern Axiom, the Three Hundred and Sixty-Five Degree Star Lords of the celestial circuit, and the perfected immortals and spirit officials dwelling among the stars. We beseech your pardon and forgiveness, that we may renew ourselves from this day forth. May our bodies attain luminosity, sharing the same radiance as the Star Palace. After attaining the Dao, may we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Eastern Marchmount**
We humbly acknowledge that spring stands at the head of the four seasons, and the virtue of wood leads the five phases. Towering in the Horn and Neck constellations, its lofty heights rival the divisions of Zhai and Lu. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of Mount Tai, the Azure Emperor of the Eastern Marchmount, and the divine immortals and spirit officials. Mindful of the dust and defilement that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek to confess our faults from the outset, praying for your blessing and protection.

After attaining the Dao, we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Southern Marchmount**
We humbly acknowledge that the virtue of fire flourishes in the south, and Mount Heng stands as its majestic guardian. Above, it aligns with the Well and Ghost constellations; beside, it overlooks the Xiang and Yuan rivers. Its sheer ravines accumulate layers of mist, while its connected peaks stretch across a thousand li of auspicious clouds. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of Mount Heng, the Vermilion Emperor of the Southern Marchmount, and the divine immortals and spirit officials. Mindful of the dust and defilement that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek to confess our faults from the outset, praying for your blessing and protection.

After attaining the Dao, we ascend into the formless, harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Western Marchmount**
We humbly acknowledge that autumn in the west embodies the flourishing power of metal, and Mount Hua’s towering heights rise to boundless grandeur. Its cliffs, carved as if by blade, soar ten thousand ren. Clusters of lotus blossoms cling to the void at the summit of emerald mists; the immortal’s palm cradles the sun amid the white clouds. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of Mount Hua, the White Emperor of the Western Marchmount, and the divine immortals and spirit officials. Mindful of the dust and defilement that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek to confess our faults from the outset, praying for your blessing and protection.

After attaining the Dao, one ascends into formlessness,
Harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Northern Marchmount**
We humbly acknowledge that the north embodies the flourishing power of water, and Mount Heng stands as guardian of that quarter. It overlooks the precarious realm of Xu and Wei, spanning the vast wilds of You and Ji. A thousand cliffs vie in their soaring heights, exhaling clouds and rain into the misty void; ten thousand ravines race in their descent, harboring ethereal mists in lush verdancy. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of Mount Heng, the Black Emperor of the Northern Marchmount, and the divine immortals and spirit officials. Mindful of the dust and defilement that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek to confess our faults from the outset, praying for your blessing and protection. After attaining the Dao, one ascends into formlessness,
Harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Central Marchmount**
We humbly acknowledge that among the Five Phases, the power of earth holds preeminence. Above, it aligns with the celestial pole; below, it guards the mighty capital. In its orientation, cloud-wreathed ravines unfold in a thousand layers; in its sheer ascent, mist-veiled peaks rise ten thousand zhang. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of Mount Song, the Yellow Emperor of the Central Marchmount, and the divine immortals and spirit officials. Mindful of the transgressions that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek to confess our faults from the outset, praying for your blessing and protection.

After attaining the Dao, one ascends into formlessness,
Harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Water Palace**
We humbly acknowledge that the great rivers surge and swell, the celestial Han flows in flight. Their unfathomable waves race onward, their boundless vastness knows no shore. Leviathans and whales find their swimming grounds, tortoises and dragons their hidden lairs. They stir the tides to follow yin’s ebb and harm, they raise mists and clouds to aid heaven and earth. Their power to moisten below is most expansive, their virtue of supreme goodness is where all归. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Grand Fast, now invoke the August Sovereign of the Water Palace, the Great Emperor of Fusang, the Divine King of Yang Valley, the Water Emperors of the Three Rivers and Four Plums, the Nine Jiang, the Twelve River Sources, and the divine immortals and spirit officials of the Water Palace. Mindful of the transgressions that may offend the true numina, we humbly seek pardon and forgiveness, praying for your blessing and protection.
After attaining the Dao, one ascends into formlessness,
Harmonizing with the Dao to merge with the True.

**Sacred Scriptures**
We humbly acknowledge that the Dao’s workings are proclaimed and propagated, the Great Sage leaves traces behind. Golden writings and jade characters, phoenix scripts and dragon seals. Sacred registers and numinous diagrams, divine formulas and secret incantations. Cultivate them, and one easily transforms the mortal heart to ascend the sagely Dao; practice them, and one discards worldly filth to tread the cloud thoroughfares. The precepts and laws are strict and clear, not bestowed upon the unworthy. With utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Yellow Register Fast, now invoke the Most High and Venerable, the Thirty-Six Divisions of Revered Scriptures, the True Writings and Sacred Talismans, the Secret Treasures of the Myriad Heavens, the Orthodox Dharma of the Ten Directions, the Guardian Deities of the Scriptures, and all numinous officials. Fearful of transgressions against the true Dao in past lives and the present, we humbly beseech the sweeping away of our boundless sins.

May the myriad sages bestow auspicious omens, and the thousand perfected confer blessings. The living and the dead alike shall prosper, their emoluments and longevity extended. Through nine nights and three paths, all shall partake of the mysterious grace. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

*The Forty-Second Scroll of the Most High Yellow Register Fast Rites* concludes.
*The Forty-Third Scroll of the Most High Yellow Register Fast Rites*
Compiled by Master Guangcheng of the Tang, Du Guangting

*Rites of Repentance to the Five Directions for Disaster Relief Among Officials and Commoners*
When ascending the altar during extreme cold, intense heat, or sudden wind and rain, lest one’s demeanor be improper or actions hasty, this repentance rite may be employed for simplicity and essentials.

**First, Pay Homage to the Directions**
We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Realms, the Great Sage Hosts Who Have Attained the Dao, the Perfected Lords and Venerable Masters, and the Divine Officials of the Ten Realms’ Immortal Lands.
*Three prostrations, each with reverent repentance.*

**Next, the Repentance**
We humbly recall that the Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Poles recline in effortless majesty above the Void of Non-Being, while the Five Elder Thearchs unfurl their charts within the Great Desert. They propagate the Dao and virtue to transform all regions, and dispense kindness and compassion to govern all beings. Whatever is entreated, they unfailingly respond.
Now, we, the sponsors of this grand Yellow Register Fast, certain officials and persons, bear profound gratitude for ruler and kin, and deep loyalty to family and state. To honor blessings and prosperity, we have established this altar and precinct. Following the prescribed rites and presenting the ritual offerings, we take refuge in the Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions’ Boundless Realms, the Great Sage Hosts Who Have Attained the Dao, the Perfected Lords and Venerable Masters, and the Divine Officials of the Ten Realms’ Immortal Lands.
We specially beseech the bestowal of their ungoverning benevolence and the diffusion of their impartial grace. May auspicious omens descend upon the ancestral temples and the imperial line’s fortune be prolonged. May the myriad states enjoy peace, and the five weapons be stilled.
Next, we pray for the nine generations and seven ancestors of the sponsor’s family to transcend the Crimson Palace. May the five clans and six relations be inscribed upon the cinnabar tablets. May a thousand disasters cease, and a hundred blessings be renewed. May all living beings together attain the shelter of the Dao. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

**The Three Luminaries**
We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Perfected Great Sages of the Sun, Moon, and Stellar Palaces, and the Divine Officials of the Three Luminaries’ Immortal Hosts.
*Three prostrations, each with reverent repentance and gratitude.*

We humbly recall that the celestial bodies hang in brilliance, illuminating the earth below. The Three Luminaries bestow their radiance, and all beings take form. The Solar Emperor and Lunar Sovereign oversee the registers of life and death, while the Stellar Palaces and Dipper Pivot jointly govern the records of sin and fortune.
Now, we, the sponsors of this grand Yellow Register Fast, certain officials and persons, with utmost sincerity take refuge in the Perfected Great Sages of the Sun, Moon, and Stellar Palaces, and the Divine Officials of the Three Luminaries’ Immortal Hosts.
We specially beseech the bestowal of their great abundance and the diffusion of their impartial virtue. May the imperial enterprise flourish and blessings descend upon the sagely court. May longevity be extended without bound, and universal peace achieved across the ten thousand realms.
Next, we pray for the nine generations of the sponsor’s family to be delivered, and a hundred blessings to converge. May their emoluments and years be renewed, and disasters and misfortunes forever cease. Through the three paths and nine nights, may their consciousness connect with the radiance of conjoined pearls and jade disks. May all moving and quiescent beings, all containing spirit, receive the gift of illumination and life.
After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

**The Five Peaks**
We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the True Lords of the Five Peaks, and the Divine Officials of the Grotto-Heavens and Sacred Mountains Who Have Attained the Dao.
*Three prostrations, each with reverent repentance and gratitude.*

We humbly recall that when the Two Modes parted, the Five Peaks divided their majesty. Below, they stabilize the earth; above, they support the celestial canopy. The sacred mountains and numinous grottoes govern spirits and gods. The underworld bureaus and immortal courts administer sin and fortune.
Now, we, the sponsors of this grand Yellow Register Fast, certain officials and persons, with utmost sincerity take refuge in the True Lords of the Five Peaks, and the Divine Officials of the Grotto-Heavens and Sacred Mountains Who Have Attained the Dao.
We specially beseech their illumination of our sincere devotion and the descent of vast blessings. First, may the imperial destiny be strengthened and the imperial plan secretly protected. May the phoenix’s reign endure for myriad millennia, and the crane’s years equal those of Mount Song and Mount Hua.
Next, may the nine generations and seven ancestors of the sponsor’s family, whose consciousness lingers in dark prisons, have their records expunged from Mount Tai’s ledgers and find the path to freedom in the immortal grottoes. May the living kin—both inner and outer relations—have their emoluments and longevity increased, and misfortunes and disasters eradicated. May their sinful records be stricken from the Five Peaks, and their names inscribed in the immortal registers of the Nine Heavens. May all moving and quiescent beings together attain liberation.
After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

**The Water Realms**
We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Great Emperor of Fusang, the Divine King of Yang Valley, the Water Emperors of the Three Rivers, Four Seas, and Nine Jiang, and the Divine Officials of the Twelve River Sources’ Water Realms.
*Three prostrations, each with reverent repentance and gratitude.*

We humbly recall that the Eight Seas support the heavens, floating the Ten Continents beyond the world, while the Nine Jiang harness the sun, dividing the Six Directions within the earthly realm. The cosmos relies on their power of conveyance, and all beings depend on their nurturing virtue. They conceal grotto-heavens within, governing all living beings. Having charge over the sources of sin and fortune, they should be entreated with utmost devotion.
Now, we, the sponsors of this grand Yellow Register Fast, certain officials and persons, with utmost sincerity take refuge in the Great Emperor of Fusang, the Divine King of Yang Valley, the Water Emperors of the Three Rivers, Four Seas, and Nine Jiang, and the Divine Officials of the Twelve River Sources’ Water Realms.
We specially beseech the unfolding of their supreme benevolence and the diffusion of their numinous and enduring grace. May auspicious omens be received at the imperial palace, and the River Chart be restored. May the imperial person’s longevity be increased, and the seas and mountains be pacified. May terrifying waves subside, and all classes of beings enjoy peace.
Next, we pray for the nine ancestors and seven generations of the sponsor’s family to be reborn in heaven and attain the Dao. May they depart the dark courts of the Yellow Springs and ascend to the square isles and round peaks of the immortal realms. May the living kin together partake of splendid blessings. May fortune and prosperity descend, and disasters and transgressions be cleansed. May all virtues daily renew, and all beings together prosper.
After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

**The Sacred Scriptures**
We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Three Supreme Worthies of the Most High, the Hosts of Sages of the Ten Directions, the Thirty-Six Divisions of Revered Scriptures, and the True Writings and Sacred Talismans.
*Three prostrations, each with reverent repentance and gratitude.*

We humbly acknowledge that before heaven and earth arose, at the very beginning of primordial chaos, the Jade Capital and Golden Towers had already spread the great wind of the Dao; the dragon-script and phoenix-characters had long expounded the profound teachings of the Twofold Mystery. First transmitted in the heavens, they gradually descended to the human realm. There are charts for attaining long life and immortality, and instructions for benefiting beings and pacifying the people. Emperors and kings have revered them to propagate transformation; perfected scholars have cultivated them to ascend to heaven. They are the root-source of the ten thousand methods and the fundamental origin of the nine schools. It is fitting to receive and uphold them, that auspicious blessings may descend.

Now, with utmost sincerity, we, the sponsors of this Great Register Retreat, the officials of such-and-such rank, take refuge in the Thirty-Six Divisions of Revered Scriptures and the True Writings and Sacred Talismans. We specially beseech the opening of great mercy and the bestowal of boundless fortune. May the sacred destiny be eternally upheld, and the grand design subtly assisted. May the ninefold palace enjoy the peace of seas and mountains, and the myriad states be harmonized under the transforming power of unified culture.

We further beseech that the three masters and nine generations of ancestors of the sponsor’s family be inscribed with virtuous names on the cinnabar registers, and that the living kin be cleansed of their transgressions recorded in the black books. May secret instructions be secretly transmitted, and the immortal ranks be silently attained. May emolument and longevity be renewed, and misfortunes and calamities forever cease. May all beings, whether soaring or sinking, plant or animal, together bathe in the mysterious grace. After attaining the Dao, they shall ascend into the formless. Harmony unites with the Dao in truth.

*Here ends Scroll Forty-Three of the Rituals of the Great Register Retreat of the Most High*
*Scroll Forty-Four of the Rituals of the Great Register Retreat of the Most High, compiled by Master Du Guangting of the Tang*

**Rite for Pacifying the Dwelling and Circulating the Dao**

The assembled officials first take their positions before the Mysterious Master and stand in formation. They chant the *Dao*, enter the chamber, and circumambulate, beginning with the offering of incense to the Five Directions in the east. They then present incense at the imperial altar and at their respective stations, each bowing to the Master while visualizing as prescribed.

*Guardian Spirits*, radiant and luminous at dawn,
Purple mists ascend through empty space.
Stellar altars gleam resplendent,
Transforming into cloud-palaces.
The solar essence and lunar spirit,
Winged between *Li* and *Kan*.
Golden Perfected issue their commands,
Dragons and tigers dispel Fengdu’s shades.
On this auspicious day, the rite proceeds,
Eight Mighty Ones drum in attendance.
Jade blossoms unfold, rainbow banners swirl,
Heavenly light descends, the Dao’s *qi* flourishes.
All beings receive universal deliverance,
Joy flows without end.

**Twenty-four strikes of the ritual drum.**

O Most High Three Heavens, Primordial Origin, Three *Qi* of the Supreme Venerable Lord Lao: Summon forth from within this servant’s body the Three and Five Merit Officers, the Attendant Officials of Left and Right, the Incense-Bearing Golden Youth, the Message-Transmitting Jade Maiden, and the Thirty-Two Fragrant Officials of the Five Thearchs and the Direct Day. Let them emerge, arrayed in solemn attire, to open the gates of the Mysterious Altar and invoke the Celestial Lords and Divine Sovereigns. May the deities of this land and its boundaries, the true officials and upright spirits, attend in mind.
